item.title: Yell command tag not working?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:4, topic:407397”][quote author=13lack drag link=topic=508681.msg3690478#msg3690478 date=1312086000]

Try.

[code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

                 if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.isDonator == 1 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("green red45")){
                    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[XxLordxX]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 1){
                    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
                    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 3 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("penguin")){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6881400>[Co-Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("13lack drag")){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=4718712>[-Owner-]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0){
                    c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
                       
                 }
              }
           }
        }

whats the difference?

}[/code]

[/quote]
“<col=255>[XxLordxX]<img=2>”+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
I got the numbers from google a while ago.[/quote]
but i need the shade, is there a way to do the shade

Read full topic

                 }else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0){

item.title: Yell command tag not working?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

so i have yell here
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.isDonator == 1 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("green red45")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=16777215>[XxLordxX]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("penguin")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6881400>[Co-Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("13lack drag")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=4718712>[-Owner-]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0){
							c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
								
						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
}

i added the blue for a player who donated, but when he yells he gets the red. why is this?
